divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were walking back from the park accross the street from our home with our son. We ran into our neighbor on our way home and our neighbor notice the first light than a second, I than turned and saw the lights and than aonther and another for the total of four light in the formation of a diamond. I went to my house a got my video camara and started to record. Than one light disappeared and the formation was in the shape of a triangle. I did record a lot of video for a single sighting.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Berlin
There was one other sighting in Berlin on or around August 25th 2013
